japanese: いいだろう。/本番に影響ない程度なら、/練習にもなるからね。
english: Fine. /As long as it doesn't affect the real thing, /it's good practice.

japanese: あれ？/流先輩、何してるんです？
english: Huh? /Nagare-senpai, what are you doing?

japanese: いいよ。/持っていくだけで判るんだろ？/なら、任しといて。
english: Fine. /You'll know when you take it, right? /Then leave it to me.

japanese: あれ？/流さん、何してるんです？
english: Huh? /Nagare-san, what are you doing?

japanese: いいカメラだと取材してても/気分がいいわ。
english: A good camera makes /covering events feel good.

japanese: あー、それってヒドい言い方。
english: Ah, that's a harsh way to put it.

japanese: いいわよ。/持っていくだけで判るんでしょ？/なら、任しといて。
english: Fine. /You'll know when you take it, right? /Then leave it to me.

japanese: いいんですよ。/流先輩はそのままで！
english: It's fine. /Nagare-senpai is fine as is!

japanese: いいの！/いわないで。
english: It's fine! /Don't say it.

japanese: いいわよねぇ、学園祭って！/血が騒ぐわね！
english: Festivals are great! /Gets the blood pumping!

japanese: いいんですか？/じゃ、遠慮なく。/パクッ！
english: Is it okay? /Then I won't hold back. /Chomp!

japanese: あーん、こういうときは、/ウソでも「任せとけ」とかいうんですぅ！
english: Aww, at times like this, /say 'leave it to me' even if it's a lie!

japanese: い、いわれてみれば、そうですね。/で、本当は何をやってるんですか？
english: W-well, now that you mention it, yes. /So what are you really doing?

japanese: いいお天気になってよかったわ。/正直、これだけが心配だったの。
english: I'm glad the weather cleared. /Honestly, that was my only worry.

japanese: いいの。気にしないで。/例えばの話なんだから。
english: It's fine. Don't worry. /It's just hypothetical.

japanese: いいんですよ。/流さんはそのままで！
english: It's fine. /Nagare-san is fine as is!

japanese: あれ？/ゆりかさんと静音さんじゃないですか。
english: Huh? /Isn't that Yurika-san and Shizune-san?

japanese: い、今から？/だって学園祭だってまだ……。
english: R-right now? /But the festival is still...

japanese: いいとも。/何だ？
english: Sure. /What is it?

japanese: いいね！　一緒に行こうよ！/全部のお店を回りたい気分！
english: Nice! Let's go together! /I want to hit all the shops!

japanese: いいね！　一緒に行こう！/全部の店を回りたい気分だな！
english: Nice! Let's go together! /I want to hit all the shops!

japanese: いい加減にしないと、/痛い目みるよ！
english: If you don't stop, /you'll be sorry!

japanese: いい天気ですね！/醍醐先輩！
english: Nice weather! /Daigo-senpai!
